name: GD Auto Deafen (Wayland)
description: Automatically deafens Discord when you reach a configurable percent in a Geometry Dash level, using a Wayland helper and Geode mod integration.

deafen-percent.name: Deafen at percent
deafen-percent.description: When reached in a level, send DEAFEN to the helper.

undeafen-on-death.name: Undeafen on death
undeafen-on-death.description: If enabled, send DEAFEN again (toggle) when the attempt resets after death.

active-in-practice.name: Active in practice mode
active-in-practice.description: If disabled, AutoDeafen does nothing while in practice mode.

active-in-startpos.name: Active in start position runs
active-in-startpos.description: If disabled, AutoDeafen does nothing on attempts started from a Start Position.
